comment.author: 67795075@N08
comment._content:
Cette petite fille ne fait vraiment pas ses 156 ans...
Elle sera certainement devenue une belle personne.
Une pensée pour elle, quel qu'ait été son destin, et merci à monsieur Daguerre, qui aura permis à ce joli sourire d'arriver jusqu'à nous.

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content: Thanks very much for your comment. It really is remarkable to look back through the years at this moment captured in time. I hadn't really looked at this image before. Thank your for bringing it to my attention. I am so glad you did.

comment.author: 24827713@N00
comment._content:
Her personality just bursts through.  I am uncomfortable with her presentation.  I don't know why the
photographer posed  her in such a seductive way.  What was he thinking for such a little girl.
